name: test_deploy_charm
description:
arrange: deploy dependencies of the OpenCTI charm.
    act: deploy the OpenCTI charm.
    assert: deployment is successful.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: deploy dependencies of the OpenCTI charm.
act: deploy the OpenCTI charm.
assert: deployment is successful.
